body.name: Waverly Sherry Lace Lightweight Elegant Floral Sheer Rod Pocket Cafe Window Curtain for Living Room (1 Panel), 54 in x 84 in, Cream
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs 29 mins
features: LIGHT FILTERING & PRIVACY - Allow just enough natural sunlight to pour into any living space while sustaining a bit of privacy with these classic sheer curtains.

FLORAL LACE DESIGN - Bring a classic elegance to your space with the Waverly Sherry Lace Floral Sheer Curtain panel. Featuring a delicate floral pattern and decorative scalloped bottom hems for a delicate look. Coordinate with the Waverly Sherry Lace Valance for a more traditional look.

ROD POCKET TOP - Convenient 3" rod pocket design allows for easy hanging on a standard curtain rod up to 1.25" diameter. Quick and easy installation. Ready to be hung right away! Curtain rod is not included. Image features the complete look, purchase includes 1 panel measuring 54" wide. Panels and Valance sold individually. Measure carefully prior to purchase.
SIMPLE CARE - Made of 100% Polyester. Machine wash cold, gentle cycle. Use only non-chlorine bleach when needed. Tumble dry low, remove promptly. Cool iron if needed.

TRUST WAVERLY - A renowned brand synonymous with elegance and quality, Waverly can help you upgrade your space with confidence. Embrace the delightful blend of style and comfort, and make your home a haven of relaxation and indulgence
body.description: Bring a classic elegance to your space with the Waverly Sherry Lace Floral Sheer Curtain panel. Featuring a delicate floral pattern and decorative scalloped bottom hems for a delicate look. Coordinate with the Waverly Sherry Lace Valance for a more traditional look. Rod pocket header makes it easy to hang your curtain panels.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us: Launched in 1923, Waverly is a home fashion and all encompassing lifestyle brand and one of the most recognized names in home furnishings. Its signature look is expertly translated into countless classic styles among home furnishing products, including fabrics, wall coverings, bedding, window treatments, decorative accessories, and other key products. Its family of brands consists of Waverly, Waverly Home, Waverly Home Classics, Waverly Baby, Waverly Celebrations, Waverly Inspirations, Traditions by Waverly, and Waverly Sun N Shade. Key vendor partners include PK Lifestyles, York, Ellery Homestyles, and Nourison. Iconix Brand Group bought Waverly in November 2008.

F. Schumacher & Co., a maker of exclusive European fabrics, launched Waverly in 1923 to bring home décor to the emerging market of American consumers who desired accessible style. The first collection consisted of eight patterns by American designer Cy Clark, and its instant popularity led to a rapid expansion of the line. The company registered the name Waverly Bonded Fabrics in 1926, and F. Schumacher hired advertising firm J. Walter Thompson to develop a promotional campaign, making Waverly synonymous with the American home since the Roaring Twenties. Waverly responded to consumer requests with the addition of its coordinating wallpapers in 1939 and the Waverly Home Fashions division in 1951, bringing its fabric collections to a gamut of home furnishings. The “Waverly Signature Look,” including the company’s famous Glosheen chintzes, florals, stripes, and plaids became synonymous with American décor, evolving into a legacy which represents quality and timelessness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very pretty sheer curtain. It is a bit darker than just a pink color, which makes it even prettier. Cute flower pattern, soft and fitted perfect.
